data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Nephelomilta Hampson, 1900, with descriptions of twelve new species and two new subspecies (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Volynkin, Anton V., Černý, Karel (2018): Revision of the genus Nephelomilta Hampson, 1900, with descriptions of twelve new species and two new subspecies (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae). Zootaxa 4472 (3): 401-451, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4472.3.1
